long_description: partner od roku 2009 specialista na restrukturalizaci a insolvenci, nemovitosti, bankovnictví a finance, spornou agendu. partner od roku 2015 specialista na bankovnictví a finance, spornou agendu, regulaci finančních služeb. partner od roku 2019 specialista na fúze & akvizice, energetiku, spornou agendu a obecné obchodněprávní poradenství. zakládající partnerka doporučovaný právník v oblastech obchodního práva, fúzí a akvizic. partner od roku 2008 specialista na fúze a akvizice, obecné obchodněprávní služby, farmacii, pracovní právo. díky úzké spolupráci a propojení bratislavské pobočky s pražskou centrálou je glatzová & co. schopna zajistit svým klientům komfort jedné advokátní kanceláře jak pro českou republiku, tak pro slovensko a poskytovat jim koordinované právní služby stejné kvality v obou zemích. tým glatzová & co. vedený partnerem erikem kolanem ve spolupráci s advokátkou lucií mach úspěšně zastupoval společnost synergy capital a.s. ze skupiny rezidenčního developera square real estate při….
generated_description: glatzova, legally known as glatzova & co., is an independent law firm based in hlavní město praha, prague, operating in the czech and slovak republics. established over 30 years ago, it is one of the oldest law firms in the czech republic and a leading player in the legal services market. the firm specializes in areas such as mergers and acquisitions, banking and finance, real estate, dispute resolution, restructuring and insolvency, competition, labor and employment, intellectual property, energy, and general legal services. is recognized for its high standards and has received numerous awards from international and domestic rating agencies. the firm is a member of several chambers of commerce and business associations, including the international chamber of commerce and the czech-german chamber of industry and commerce.

long_description: founded 1994, glatzová & co. has become one of the czech republic's leading law firms. glatzová & co.'s excellent reputation is based on its legal expertise, its understanding of clients' business interests and its positive approach to resolving legal issues. relying on its rich experience, the firm sets the highest standard in legal services. working in close coordination with its office in bratislava, glatzová & co. provides clients with the convenience of a single law firm serving both the czech republic and slovakia. glatzová & co. is highly rated by independent international assessors, including chambers global, chambers europe, european legal 500 and iflr1000 – international financial law review. we have been repeatedly named the best czech law firm by chambers europe and who is who legal. glatzová & co. provides legal services in all areas of trade and industry and assists clients with all facets of their business. glatzová & co. offers its services in czech, slovak, english and german.
